thread.title: Is the Skyway worth the five bucks?
thread.title_full: Is the Skyway worth the five bucks?

author: Eric Zorn
title: Is the Skyway worth the five bucks?
text:
Is the Skyway worth the five bucks? E. Jason Wambsgans / Chicago Tribune How much time, if any, would you have to save in order to choose the Skyway, shown here in 2016, over the freeway? How much time, if any, would you have to save in order to choose the Skyway, shown here in 2016, over the freeway? (E. Jason Wambsgans / Chicago Tribune) 
I'll reveal the results in next Sunday's column. 
"Facing the chin music" item from my Sunday column is here 
Re:Tweets 
The winner of our reader poll for funniest tweet of the week is @therealeatwood's satirical take on a common conservative complaint: "This political correctness is out of control. It's like you can't even perpetuate centuries-old oppression without facing social disapproval." 
Never have the Mincing Rascals been so busy or so voluble! Listen to our weekly news chat via iTunes, WGN-plus or wherever fine podcasts are served.
